title: Hidden costs
creator_credit: James Mann, Tony Paice and Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development
brief_description: Looks at the hidden cost of shoplifting not only to the consumer and shopkeepers, but the cost to the legal system and the consequences for the offender.Aimed at a teenage audience.
creator_credit_for_label: James Mann, Tony Paice and Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development
